text: Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn duar kuram mɨgei, “Nɨ duar kuram, nɨ gumazir kam ategh azenan izɨ.” Iesus kamaghɨn a mɨgeima, ezɨ gumazir kam pamtem arava kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Nɨ manmaghɨn na damuasa, Iesus biziba bar dar pɨn itir Godɨn Otarim. Kɨ Godɨn damazimɨn pamtem nɨn azangsɨsi, nɨ na gasɨghasɨghan markɨ.”
